nodes.text: You are a warrior waking up in a strange forest after a battle. A path lies ahead, and you hear faint cries from the woods.
The path leads to a ruined temple. As you approach, shadows move inside.
You find a wounded beast caught in a trap. It growls weakly.
Inside the temple, you find an ancient sword. The power courses through your veins. Suddenly, a guardian appears!
You see robed figures performing a ritual. One of them notices you.
The beast transforms into a magical spirit, offering to aid you on your journey.
The cries stop. As you walk away, you're ambushed by forest bandits!
After a fierce battle, you defeat the guardian and gain control of the temple's secrets. The end.
The guardian tests your wisdom. You pass, gaining its trust and ancient knowledge. The end.
You escape into the forest but get lost for days. Eventually, you find your way home. The end.
The robed figures welcome you. They believe you are the prophesied hero. The end.
With the spirit's aid, you overcome many challenges and unite the forest clans. The end.
You walk alone and face many trials, but your strength carries you to victory. The end.
You bravely fight but are outnumbered and fall. The forest remembers your courage. The end.
The bandits rob you and leave you stranded. Eventually, a merchant rescues you. The end.
You're a top-level spy tasked with infiltrating a secret facility. Your handler offers two approaches.

choices.text: Go in disguised as a janitor
Parachute onto the roof at night

nodes.text: Your disguise works. Inside, you overhear guards talking about a suspicious delivery.
You land on the roof and find a ventilation shaft.
The package is a bomb. You defuse it just in time, becoming a hero to some, a threat to others. The end.
You reach the server room and extract vital intel unnoticed. Mission accomplished. The end.
The vents lead you to a secret lab. You discover illegal experiments.
You find a blind spot in the cameras. A perfect escape route later. You continue the mission successfully. The end.
You plant charges and destroy the lab. The explosion exposes the organization. The end.
You quietly send evidence to HQ. The agency takes it down without a trace. The end.

stories.title: The Midnight Adventure of Lila and the Moon Cat

nodes.text: Lila, a curious girl who listens to the stars, hears a strange whisper one night: 'The Moon Cat is missing... Only a child of Earth can help.' A glowing silver pawprint appears on her windowsill.

choices.text: Ignore it and go back to sleep

nodes.text: Lila decides to sleep. The whisper fades and is never heard again. The Moon weeps silver tears, and dreams slowly vanish. The end.
Lila is transported to a magical Moon filled with glowing trees. She meets Nova, the Moon Cat, who explains the Shadow Fox has stolen the Moon Crystal.
Nova nods sadly and sends Lila back. She spends her life wondering what might have happened. The Moon remains dim. The end.
Nova leads Lila to the Forest of Forgotten Wishes. A spirit named Whimsy offers help. The trees whisper old dreams and shadows stir.
Without Whimsy, Lila gets lost among forgotten dreams and is trapped in the forest. The end.
As they journey, shadowy vines attack Lila. Whimsy urges her to believe in herself.
The shadows wrap around Lila and she falls into darkness. The end.
Lila must travel down the River of Time. Good and bad memories flood around her.

choices.text: Accept her past and move forward

nodes.text: At the river’s end is the Bridge of Echoes, guarded by the Moon Rabbits. They ask her to prove her heart is pure.
The rabbits sense dishonesty and block her path. She is sent back to the forest. The end.
They reach the Shadow Fox’s cave. Inside, the Moon Crystal glows brightly. The Shadow Fox appears, snarling.

choices.text: Confront the Shadow Fox with courage
Try to understand the Shadow Fox

nodes.text: Lila uses her Moonlight powers to battle. With Nova and Whimsy, they defeat the Shadow Fox and restore the Moon Crystal.

choices.text: Return home with a piece of the Moonlight
Stay on the Moon and become a guardian

nodes.text: Lila learns the Shadow Fox was once a forgotten wish. She offers him kindness, and he returns the Moon Crystal peacefully.

choices.text: Return home and share her story
Stay and help forgotten wishes find light

nodes.text: Lila returns home, forever changed. She becomes a storyteller, helping others believe in their dreams. The end.
Lila stays on the Moon, guarding dreams and guiding other children on magical adventures. The end.
You awaken in a glowing cavern, clutching a shimmering crystal. An echoing voice whispers, 'Return it, or be consumed.' Two tunnels stretch out before you.
The left tunnel leads to an underground lake. A boat floats silently at the edge. A shadow watches from the other side.
The right tunnel opens into a chamber filled with ancient statues. One statue is cracked and leaking a strange blue mist.
As you cross the lake, a serpent rises. It speaks, 'Only those who offer something may pass.'

choices.text: Offer a piece of your memory

nodes.text: The water is freezing. Halfway across, you're pulled under by invisible hands.
The mist surrounds you, and time stops. You see visions of a future where the crystal saves a dying world.
You pass safely into a sunlit garden underground. A glowing tree hums with energy.

choices.text: Place the crystal at its roots

nodes.text: The serpent swallows the crystal and disappears. The lake parts, revealing a glowing doorway. You step through into a radiant world of peace. The end.
You forget your past but gain safe passage. On the far shore, you begin a new life as a wanderer of forgotten truths. The end.
You break free and reach the shore, exhausted but alive. A hidden village welcomes you and you become their protector. The end.
You surrender and awaken in a crystal cocoon. You are reborn as a guardian of the cave. The end.
You become one with the vision, transformed into a beacon of hope. You ascend to the stars. The end.
You shatter the vision, and the crystal darkens. You're alone in a ruined world. The end.
The tree absorbs the crystal and blossoms into radiant light. Peace spreads across the realm and you become a legend. The end.
You leave the garden, always wondering what might have been. The journey continues into forgotten lands. The end.
